pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Arc KDE - This is a port of the popular GTK theme Arc for Plasma 5 desktop with a few additions and extras.
In this repository you'll find:
Aurorae Themes Konsole Color Schemes Konversation Themes Kvantum Themes Plasma Color Schemes Plasma Desktop Themes Plasma Look-and-Feel Settings Wallpapers Yakuake Skins
NOTE: Plasma theme Arc Color now supports KDE Color Schemes with Papirus icon theme.
